review: As a Prime member, it was a no-brainer to order it when it was $19. I really don't need it as I have several Rokus and smart DVD players plugged into my TVs but I thought for the price, I would try it out. It is a great device, very easy to connect to your TV and get watching some content. I like the looks of it; it's small and sleek. The only gripe I have is that I had a difficult time opening the remote to put the batteries in. Overall, I would recommend it if you don't already have internet access with an existing device.
